ygData.msgSnippet: Hook walks back after that idiotic display. He walks into the back room. Okay Constructicons, we need to get to work to be done, and quickly. he came out

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Hook walks back after that idiotic display. He walks into the back room.
"Okay Constructicons, we need to get to work to be done, and quickly."
he came out with the component. He put it down, and climbed up the side
of the ship. As soon as he reached the wing he nealt down, and
transformed, then lowerd his crane and hook over the side. With
beautiful persition, he hooked the Hyperdrive, then began to real it
upwards. He then extended his crane area, over to the engine, and
lowered it down. He unlatched his hook, and the transformed, using his
arms to push himself up. He leapt off the wing, and glided into the
engine compartment with Mixmaster, and took out a small laser welder,
and began to attach it.
